Welcome to Cartouche¶

Cartouche is a Sphinx extension for transforming easy-to-read docstrings into the reStructuredText consumed by Sphinx.

Contents:

  • Installing cartouche
  • Overview
  • Functions and Methods
    • A typical docstring
    • Args
    • Return and Returns
    • Yield and Yields
    • Raises
  • cartouche API
  • Frequently Asked Questions
    • Where does the name cartouche come from?
    • Didn’t this project used to be called hieroglyph?
    • Are attribute lists in class docstrings supported?
  • Version 1.0
  • Version 0.9
